I like that it doesn't contain any artificial colours, flavours, fragrance, or preservatives, and doesn't contain any animal products.
It certainly helps with calmness, relaxation, and deep, restful sleep and has been a great substitute for my sleep aid medication, which I wanted to cut down on and have managed to. I felt the benefits after the second week. I am still on my first tub, and I am happy with it so far.

review_title: Inexpensive, very good composition and effective action
review_text: I am for a reasonable approach to taking food supplements, you need to understand that these are not food products, and do not need to be taken constantly. I believe that they should be taken only when there is a need for it, take a certain period of time, and when the problem is solved, stop taking it. In this complex there is good composition and effective action, not inferior to expensive complexes. This complex includes herbs that may help promote calmness by reducing GABA breakdown, improving stress response and maintaining adequate levels of mood-stabilizing brain chemicals. At beginning, you can try 1 tablet, perhaps this will be enough for you, if not then take the 2nd. Everything individually depends on many parameters, one of the important parameters is your weight, how much stress you have . You should not take this drug regularly, as the herbs it contains with long-term use can lead to side effects. While the exact cause of depression is largely unknown, some researchers believe that a serotonin imbalance may affect your mood, leading to depression. However, keep in mind that other studies have produced conflicting results on the relationship between low serotonin levels and depression. Still, 5-HTP supplements are thought to treat depression by increasing serotonin levels. For example, one study of 15 women found that combining 5-HTP with creatine improved symptoms of depression after 8 weeks. Another small study in people with Parkinson's disease concluded that 5-HTP could help improve symptoms of depression compared with a placebo.

Relaxation is a physical state that some natural plant nutrients can help you achieve. Certain herbs have long been used to support a normal, healthy stress response and a state of relaxation. Over time, they can also lead to more restful sleep. In particular, valerian root helps maintain healthy levels of GABA, a neurochemical that helps the body maintain a normal state of calm and relaxation. According to medical research, hop extract also has a similar effect on GABA levels in the body. Passionflower, on the other hand, offers a completely different way to promote relaxation and calm during sleep. It can keep levels of cortisol, a stress hormone that contributes to fatigue, poor concentration, and insomnia, within normal limits. Celery seeds are an important natural source of magnesium. This mineral is important for the basic relaxation cycle and contraction of muscles and other tissues. Without magnesium, skeletal muscles, smooth muscles in the artery walls, lungs, and other organs would not be able to relax. Catnip and orange peel have similar effects, promoting healthy relaxation and deep, restful sleep.

Relaxation is a physical state that some natural plant nutrients can help bring about. Certain herbs have long been used to support normal, healthy stress responses and states of relaxation. Over time, they can also lead to more restful sleep. In particular, valerian root helps maintain healthy levels of GABA, a neurochemical that helps the body maintain a normal state of calm and relaxation. According to medical research, hop extract also has a similar effect on GABA levels in the body. On the other hand, passionflower offers a completely different way of relaxing and calming while sleeping. It can keep levels of cortisol, the stress hormone that contributes to fatigue, lack of concentration, and insomnia, within normal limits. Celery seeds are an important natural source of magnesium. This mineral is important for the main cycle of relaxation, contraction of muscles and other tissues. Without magnesium, skeletal muscles, smooth muscles in the walls of arteries, lungs and other organs could not relax. Catnip and orange peel have a similar effect, promoting healthy relaxation and deep restful sleep.

Relaxation is a physical state that we can move into with the help of some natural phytonutrients. Many herbs have a long history of use to support healthy and natural responses to stress and a state of relaxation. Over time, they may also lead to a more normal state of deep sleep. To be more specific, valerian root may help support healthy levels of gamma-aminobutyric acid, a neurochemical that helps the body maintain a natural state of stillness and relaxation. According to clinical data, hops extract also appears to have the same effect on GABA levels in the body. On the other hand, passionflower may offer an entirely different method of supporting relaxation and sleep. It may support healthy and normal levels of cortisol, the stress hormone that actively contributes to extreme fatigue, lack of concentration and insomnia. Celery seed is an important natural source of magnesium. This mineral is important for the basic cycle of relaxation and contraction of muscles and other tissues. Without magnesium, the skeletal muscles and smooth muscles in artery walls, lungs, and other organs would literally be unable to release and relax. Orange peel and catnip also work in the same ways to help support healthy, deep relaxation and restful sleep.

Founded in 1967 Helps Support Healthy Sleep Dietary Supplement Gluten Free Soy Free Lab Tested & Guaranteed by Mason cGMP Registered Relaxation is a physical state that some natural plant-based nutrients can help achieve. Certain herbs have long been used to support normal, healthy stress responses and states of relaxation. Over time, they can also lead to more restful sleep. In particular, valerian root helps maintain healthy levels of GABA, a neurochemical that helps the body maintain a normal state of calm and relaxation. According to medical research, hop extract also has a similar effect on GABA levels in the body. On the other hand, passionflower offers a completely different way of relaxing and calming while sleeping. It can keep levels of cortisol, the stress hormone that contributes to fatigue, lack of concentration, and insomnia, within normal limits. Celery seeds are an important natural source of magnesium. This mineral is important for the main cycle of relaxation, contraction of muscles and other tissues. Without magnesium, skeletal muscles, smooth muscles in the walls of arteries, lungs and other organs could not relax. Catnip and orange peel have a similar effect, promoting healthy relaxation and deep restful sleep. the smell of the tablets is specific. smell strongly of herbs. the effect is noticeable. the size of the tablets is small. the ingredients are all natural.

Sleep is the most important condition for our health. Unfortunately, it is very dependent on many factors. And are there many lucky people among us who regularly manage to fully rest at night? Sleep is my “weak link” since childhood: any problems and unresolved issues “hit” the night's rest. But iherb and a number of additives have greatly improved the situation. In particular, this complex. It is attractive to me in that: 1. it does not cause daytime sleepiness; 2. promotes faster falling asleep without "falling" into sleep; 3. reduces muscle tension; 4. goes well with phenibut, taurine, 5-NTR, melatonin (choose prolonged or two-phase), magnesium, glycine - I periodically change the combination of these components. By the way, I have patients who canceled sleeping pills on such combinations .; 5.cheap., Which allows you to try it without prejudice to the budget. If suddenly it does not work, it is not financially critical; 6.natural composition - valerian, passionflower, hops, celery, catnip (and not at all hemp, as the sloppy translation in the description), orange peel; 7. indicate the concentrations of all components, no Proprietary Blends.

The modern world is experiencing a real boom in melatonin. This hormone - a natural sleeping pill, antioxidant and immunomodulator - is called the elixir of youth, beauty and health, which can significantly improve the quality of human life. Melatonin protects us from stress and premature aging, promotes falling asleep and is responsible for our deep, restful and even sleep that brings natural rest and recovery. With age, the production of melatonin in the body decreases, and it is this that is a signal to all body systems that it is time to age. In general, melatonin is beneficial for all people over 35. It is usually taken in courses of about 1-3 mg at night. The frequency of administration per week varies individually. Melatonin is often referred to as travel medicine. With a sharp change of time zones, when it is morning on the internal biological clock, and in the city where we arrived, it is already deep night and it's time to sleep, this hormone will gently transfer our hands to a new time. Of course, you can take melatonin without unnecessary fears, but here it is important not to overdo it with the dosage, I started with 0.300 mg and stopped at 2 mg. Before using, you should still consult with a specialist and choose the right dosage !!! ...
